column4: hello, everybody know how to compile the software gyachi on a x64 ?
read the Readme after you extract..

exxon, i run the ./autogen.sh, then i do ./configure --disable-rpath --enable-maintainer-mode --prefix /usr,  and after i install all dependans (alot) and also find the old version of libgtkhtml2, i finally use Make, but at the end it give me an error
the version the package is old so complile the package according to you kernel version
